thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Focus Media's Net Profits Up In Q1, 2017, Plans Share Buyback

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Focus Media's Net Profits Up In Q1, 2017, Plans Share Buyback

organizations.name: focus media information technology co ltd

text:
Focus Media Information Technology Co Ltd:
* SAYS Q1 NET PROFIT UP 9.1 PERCENT Y/Y AT 1.2 BILLION YUAN ($190.08 million)
* SAYS 2017 NET PROFIT UP 34.9 PERCENT Y/Y AT 6.0 BILLION YUAN
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BUY BACK UP TO 3.0 BILLION YUAN WORTH OF COMPANY SHARES AT UP TO 13 YUAN PER SHARE WITHIN 12 MONTHS
* SAYS UNIT PLANS TO INVEST 300 MILLION YUAN, 50 MILLION YUAN AND 10 MILLION YUAN IN THREE INVESTMENT FUNDS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FcM91Y ; bit.ly/2FbH4Hk ; bit.ly/2vIDGEe ; bit.ly/2HrdVJU ; bit.ly/2FbTmiP ; bit.ly/2Fcnk6d Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3131 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
